H0.text: In food E Numbers 100-109 are which colour. Red

H1.text: In food E Numbers 100-109 are which colour. Blue

H2.text: In food E Numbers 100-109 are which colour. Green

H3.text: In food E Numbers 100-109 are which colour. Yelow

A4.text: Curcumin is a bright yellow chemical produced by plants of the Curcuma longa species.

A5.text: Its E number is E 100 in the European Union.
